https://tmrev.io/movie/151523-3 Blind Saints 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/nCBS0nJiqV3QnM3KALU3TyHunuU.jpg To avoid time in jail, three wily men agree to be ministers at a local church. While bungling through their duties, they uncover a greedy plot to steal from the church. When they try to rescue the church, the men wind up getting rescued in a God encounter they never expected. 3 Blind Saints
